review: The Amazon FireTV is the perfect solution for your streaming needs! I wanted to put Twitch streams on my TV and this was just the product for the job, especially after Amazon's purchase of Twitch.The device itself is sleek and simple, its just a small black box with a few plugs. I was surprised by its ability to receive an excellent wifi connection despite being fairly far from my router. It could hold a fairly strong and fast connection, unlike my Chrome Cast.The UI is fast and powerful, and fairly organized. Sometimes the apps you have installed have to be searched for instead of simply chosen from the main menu but that is fine if you're reusing your most commonly used apps anyways. The remote is a bit small for my taste (and a bit too small to easily locate when it gets lost) but it's very effective.I am very pleased by the Amazon FireTV, and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to stream, well, anything at all.
